home.honor1: Years of experience in the film extrusion automation industry.
home.honor2: ISO 9001 certified; core technologies protected by multiple utility model patents.
home.honor3: Blown film production lines equipped with Jinjiu's intelligent control systems.
home.honor4: Employees specializing in R&D, manufacturing, and technical service.
home.offer: We specialize in intelligent plastic film equipment, offering integrated solutions for thickness measurement, air ring control, and automation.
home.case: Explore real-world projects where our intelligent control systems have helped customers improve film quality, reduce waste, and boost production efficiency.
home.about1: Jinjiu Automation Technology Co., Ltd. is a leading provider of intelligent control systems for the blown film industry, specializing in automatic air ring control systems, sweep thickness gauges, rotary thickness gauges, and gravimetric dosing systems. Our solutions are designed to improve film uniformity, reduce material waste, and enhance production efficiency.
home.about2: With a strong R&D team and a number of independent intellectual property rights, JINJIU Automation has developed proprietary technologies that integrate precision sensors, closed-loop control algorithms, and industrial communication protocols. Our products are widely used across China and exported to Southeast Asia, the Middle East, and other regions.
home.about3: JINJIU Automation is committed to advancing the digitalization and automation of the film extrusion process, helping our partners achieve higher quality, smarter manufacturing, and sustainable growth.

product.description: Jinjiu Automation specializes in intelligent control systems for the blown film industry. Our main products include automatic air ring (air volume and temperature control), traversing and rotating thickness gauges, gravimetric weighing systems, and single loss-in-weight feeders. Widely used in various film production lines, our solutions help customers achieve efficient, stable, and intelligent manufacturing.
product.tips: We support all types of blown film production lines and offer fully customized automation solutions to meet your specific needs.

about.part1:
Dongguan Jinjiu Automation Technology Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as Jinjiu Technology) is based in Dongguan, the core hinterland of the Guangdong Hong Kong Macao Greater Bay Area. As a national high-tech enterprise, the company focuses on the entire industry chain of research and development, production, sales, and services, and is committed to becoming a leading enterprise in the field of global plastic film intelligent equipment. 
 After fifteen years of continuous cultivation, Jinjiu Technology has built a technology matrix with online thickness measurement automatic wind ring system as the core, forming a three in one solution system of hardware equipment software algorithm intelligent control. The AI intelligent closed-loop control technology independently developed by the company breaks through the limitations of traditional blown film processes that rely on manual experience. Through multi-sensor data fusion and machine learning algorithm optimization, it achieves a precision of film thickness deviation control of ≤± 1.5%, which is more than 40% higher than the industry average level.
about.part2:
Online Thickness & Air Ring System: The Smart Brain of Blown Film Production
Built on three core modules—automatic air ring, online thickness gauge, and intelligent control system—JinJiu Automation offers a one-stop closed-loop solution for consistent film thickness, stable production, and efficient material use.
1. Smart Air Ring
Multi-zone closed-loop control adjusts airflow in real-time to respond to bubble fluctuations. Patented airflow design improves uniformity and reduces manual tuning.
2. High-Precision Thickness Gauge
Non-contact scanning with 0.1μm resolution enables real-time monitoring, supporting various materials and co-extrusion processes.
3. Intelligent Control System
Powered by proprietary algorithms for synchronized optimization of thickness and airflow. Supports data tracking, self-learning, and remote maintenance.
about.part3:
✅ Leading the way: Our R&D team has over 10 years of industry experience and our core technology has obtained multiple national patent certifications.
✅ Quality commitment: The core components are made of imported electronic components and have passed ISO9001 quality management system certification
✅ Cost reduction and efficiency improvement: Improve thickness uniformity by over 50%, reduce raw material waste by 15% -25%, and help customers enhance competitiveness.
✅ Worry free service: providing customized solution design, installation and debugging, and 24-hour response services to fully escort customer production.

section1.title: 1. Information Collection
section1.content: We collect the following information you voluntarily provide via our contact form: your name, email address, and message content.

section2.title: 2. Purpose of Use

To provide information related to our products or services
section2.note: We will not use your personal information for any unauthorized commercial purposes.

section3.title: 3. Information Storage & Security
section3.content: We adopt reasonable technical and administrative measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, use, or loss.

section4.title: 4. Third-party Disclosure

To protect our legitimate rights and interests

section5.title: 5. Your Rights

section6.title: 6. Changes to Terms

automatic_air_ring: 1.Quickly adjust to the target thickness deviation value in the automatic state (about 10 minutes).
4.IPatent design for control valve , high-end intelligent motor adjusting damper.
6.Automatic air ring control mode: A.air volume type, B.air temperature type.
lift_automatic_air_ring: 1.Quickly adjust to the target thickness deviation value in the automatic state (about 10 minutes).
4.IPatent design for control valve , high-end intelligent motor adjusting damper.
7.Automatic air ring control mode: A.air volume type, B.air temperature type.
single_Loss-in-Weight: 1. Provide production data information (kg/h, g/m, etc.).
2. Reduce raw material usage (by lowering the minimum thickness, 1.5%-3% of raw materials can be saved within customer acceptable range).
3. Increase production capacity (reduce weight to achieve higher output).
4. Improve product quality (stable meter weight ensures consistent product dimensions).
5. Enhanced repeatability (product consistency is rarely dependent on operators).
6. Low startup scrap rate (provides precise control during the start-up phase).
7. Capable of controlling up to 11 extruders simultaneously.
solutions: ④ Upper Traction Measurement and Control
Cross-Direction_Scanning_Thickness_Gauge: 1. Utilizes X-ray technology for high-precision measurement, suitable for various film materials.
2. Sweeping structure enables real-time monitoring of the full width thickness.
3. Non-contact measurement ensures no damage to the film surface.
4. Compatible with automatic air ring control for improved thickness uniformity.
5. Stable data output and fast response, ideal for high-speed production lines.
6. Equipped with intelligent algorithm control to automatically optimize measurement and feedback, enhancing system adaptability.
rotary_thickness_gauge: 1. Ring scanning design comprehensively detects thickness variation in the circumferential direction.
2. Real-time feedback system enhances process stability.
3. Compact structure, easy installation, compatible with various blown film machines.
4. High-precision sensors ensure reliable measurement data.
5. Capable of synchronizing with multiple extruders to improve overall control efficiency.
6. Supports intelligent algorithm control for thickness fluctuation prediction and automatic adjustment.
X-Ray_rotary_thickness_gauge: 1. Ring scanning design comprehensively detects thickness variation in the circumferential direction.
2. Real-time feedback system enhances process stability.
3. Compact structure, easy installation, compatible with various blown film machines.
4. High-precision sensors ensure reliable measurement data.
5. Capable of synchronizing with multiple extruders to improve overall control efficiency.
6. Supports intelligent algorithm control for thickness fluctuation prediction and automatic adjustment.
7. Utilizes X-ray technology for high-precision measurement, suitable for various film materials.
dosing: 1. Multiple components (2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10) can be freely combined.

2. One-material-one-pipe feeding ensures material purity; supports remote conveying (approx. 20–100 meters) with low energy consumption and high efficiency, meeting energy-saving and emission reduction standards.
3. Pulse automatic dust removal system with self-cleaning function; no need for disassembly, greatly reducing maintenance cost.
4. Single batch dosing amount ranges from 1000g to 3000g.
5. High dosing accuracy thanks to the combination of dosing valve and dosing screw.
6. Suitable for irregular-shaped, poor-flowing granules; micro-additive function (0.1%–10%) enables precise blending.
8. Weighing and mixing hopper with uniform mixing; material directly fed to the extruder to ensure material uniformity.
9. Mixing hopper linked with extruder for stable extrusion flow, improving longitudinal film thickness uniformity.
